name: Art-data
tagline: scripts to collect data about artworks and to process it
body:
# art-data
This repository holds scripts to collect data about artworks and to process it. The data is collected in the "data" directory. At the moment the project focuses on the objects of the Bavarian State Paintings Collections (German: Bayerische Staatsgem√§ldesammlungen; BStGS).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
